definitions.definition: An outdoor facility for urination and defecation, whether open (latrine) or enclosed (outhouse).
A lavatory: a room with a toilet.
A toilet: a fixture used for urination and defecation.
A partaker; one having an interest in an action, contract, etc. to which he is not himself a party.
Private, exclusive; not public; one's own.
definitions.example: The king retreated to his privy chamber.

definitions.definition: With knowledge of; party to; let in on.
definitions.example: He was privy to the discussions.
